All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddCommand
A command that adds a new movie to the collection.
AddIfMaxCommand
Command to add a new movie to the collection only if the movie's MPAA rating is greater than or equal to the highest rated movie in the collection.
AddXmlCommand
 
ClearCommand
This command clears all movies in the collection.
ClearHistoryCommand
A command that clears the history file.
CollectionManager
The CollectionManager class manages a collection of movies.
Color
 
Command
The Command interface represents a command that can be executed by the application.
Coordinates
A class representing the coordinates of a point on a two-dimensional plane.
ExecuteCommand
A class that represents the execute_script command, which executes all the instructions from a given file path.
ExitCommand
This class represents the command to exit the program.
FileNaming
A helper class for renaming files.
FilterByNameCommand
FilterByNameCommand is a class that implements the Command interface and is responsible for filtering the movies in the collection by name.
FindFiles
A helper class to search for files in the project directory and its subdirectories.
HelpCommand
HelpCommand is a class that implements the Command interface.
InfoCommand
The InfoCommand class implements the Command interface and represents the "info" command that prints information about the collection, such as the type, size, and path of the collection file, and the number of models in the collection.
Location
A class representing a location with a name and 2D coordinates.
Main
The main class for the application.
MainHelper
A helper class for the main application.
MethodReturn
This class represents a wrapper class used to return both the setters of a Movie object and the Movie object itself from a method at the same time.
Movie
Represents a movie.
MpaaRating
An enumeration representing the various Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) film ratings.
ParseXmlCommand
A command that parses an XML file and adds the movies it contains to a collection.
Person
Represents a person with name, birthday, height, eye color, and location.
PrintMpaaCommand
This class implements the Command interface to print the collection to console in order of mpaa rating.
RemoveByIdCommand
This class represents a command to remove a movie from a collection by its ID.
RemoveLowerCommand
RemoveLowerCommand is a class that represents the remove_lower command.
SaveCommand
A command that saves a collection of movies to an XML file.
SaveToHistoryCommand
This class represents a command to save a command to a history file.
ShowCommand
The ShowCommand class implements the Command interface and represents the "show" command.
ShowHistoryCommand
This class represents a command to show the last 10 commands that were entered to console.
UpdateCommand
Represents an UpdateCommand which updates an element in a collection by its ID
UserInputHandler
A class for handling user input and executing the appropriate command.
Worker
 
XmlConverter
A utility class for converting a HashSet of Movie objects to an XML string representation.
XmlToJava
The XmlToJava class provides a method to parse an XML file and convert its contents to a HashSet of Movie objects.
